DOC.brief_summary: Pilot randomized study of the sidlenafil efficacy in combination with oral anticoagulants in the treatment of patients with intermediate-high risk of pulmonary embolism
DOC.brief_title: Sidlenafil in Combination With Oral Anticoagulants in Patients With Intermediate-high Risk of Pulmonary Embolism
